ygData.subject: Re: Oracle of K'arnon
ygData.msgSnippet: I also know from first hand experience, I have killed him many a time and have gotten faction hits each time...  i m pretty sure it s not with high elves, i m
ygData.messageBody:
I also know from first hand experience, I have killed him many a time and
have gotten faction hits each time... i'm pretty sure it's not with high
elves, i'm KOS to the oracle and guardian now and not to high elves... i
don't think the faction is anything important

----- Original Message -----
From: <SPRUSBRUCE@...>
To: <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, December 23, 1999 1:27 PM
Subject: Re: [eq_wizards] Oracle of K'arnon


> From: SPRUSBRUCE@...
>
> about 3 or 4 months ago and from what I have heard they havent changed
it...I
> dont think they can have a faction hit due to he likes everyone even
> necromancers ( I am one) and he gives a quest out to ALL casters.
>
